description: the Canadian Conservation Institute requires a vacuum freeze dryer. Delivery to Ottawa, ON must be received by latest date:July 5, 2024. Bidders must be in line with the mandatory requirements reflected in the RFP.
tags: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

*Laboratory freeze dryers and lyopholizers and accessories
full_summary:
## Tender Announcement
### Information

* **Reference Number**: WS4414626642-Doc4445613125
* **Tender Name**: C1111-230117-PR10219 Vacuum Freeze Dryer
* **Publication Date**: February 15, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: March 8, 2024, at 14:00 EST (Extended: New deadline: March 5, 2024, at 14:00 EST)

### Key Details
* **Bid Opportunity Title**: C1111-230117-PR10219 Laboratory Freeze Dryer and Accessories
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Trade Agreements Applicable**: Various international trade agreements
* **Regions of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR) (Ottawa, ON)
* **End-User Entities**: Canadian Conservation Institute (CCI)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: March 13, 2024 (refers to amended contract)
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 7, 2025

### Important Documents
* The tender package can be accessed through Ariba Discovery (https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18806348?extsite=MTg4MDYzNDhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) and CanadaBuys.
* Interested bidders are required to submit their proposals to the procurement entity.

### Contact Information
* For more information, please contact Nadine Brazeau, Procurement Specialist, (SPAC/PSPC), at nadine.brazeau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

### Warning
Please note that any proposals submitted after the new deadline will not be accepted.
